title: The open spaces shall be exclusive of means of accesses / internal roads / designations or reservations, roads and areas for road widening in Development Plan / Regional Plan
clause_text: The open spaces shall be exclusive of means of accesses / internal roads / designations or reservations, roads and areas for road widening in Development Plan / Regional Plan.
